title: MOE-TRF Projects - STLA T&L Showcase - SIT

meta.description: A list of projects supported by the Ministry of Education's Tertiary Education Research Fund (MOE-TRF).

text_lines: Ministry of Education Tertiary Education Research Fund (MOE-TRF) Projects
Ministry of Education Tertiary Education Research Fund (MOE-TRF) Projects
A list of approved MOE-TRF projects that promote effective and innovative teaching and learning practices.

Learn More with SIT Teaching and Learning Academy
A grant established by the Ministry of Education to spur innovations at the higher education level.
A list of projects funded by the Applied Learning and Innovation Grant (ALIGN) and SALT Grant.
A list of projects funded by the Harnessing Applied Learning Online (HALO) grant.
